Home > JC Bose University > Computer Engineering > Semester 6 > Real Time Systems

Real Time Systems (PCC-CS-505)

Real Time Systems is a course that covers the fundamentals of big data technologies, including Hadoop, MapReduce, and Spark. It focuses on the storage, processing, and analysis of large datasets.

No PDFs found for this subject.
